metadata.title: CVE-2020-36024 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in freedesktop poppler version 20.12.1, allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (DoS) via crafted .pdf fileto FoFiType1C::convertToType1 function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36024` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.2
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.2
libpoppler-glib8 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.2
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.2
libpoppler118 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.2
poppler-utils - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '22.02.0-2ubuntu0.2').
